movies.title: Top Gun
movies.description: The Top Gun Naval Fighter Weapons School is where the best of the best train to refine their elite flying skills.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
movies.description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

movies.title: Star Wars: A New Hope
movies.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

movies.title: Dazed and Confused
movies.description: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

movies.title: Stand by Me
movies.description: A writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

movies.title: I Saw the TV Glow
movies.description: A teenager just trying to make it through life in the suburbs is introduced by a classmate to a mysterious late-night TV show.

movies.title: The Matrix Reloaded
movies.description: Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army.

movies.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
movies.description: A pair of charismatic seniors take socially awkward Charlie under their wing.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movies.title: Sanatorium pod Klepsydrą
movies.description: Józef visits his dying father at a remote mental institution, where time itself doesn't seem to exist.

movies.title: Aftersun
movies.description: Sophie reflects on the shared joy and private melancholy of a holiday she took with her father twenty years earlier.

movies.title: Karate Kid
movies.description: Recently relocated from NJ to LA, Daniel becomes the target of a gang of Cobra Kai dojo students.

movies.title: The Karate Kid (2010)
movies.description: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the 12-year-old boy embraces Kung Fu.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine.

movies.title: Mysterious Skin
movies.description: Two pre-adolescent boys both experienced a strange event and later it affects their lives in different ways.

movies.title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
movies.description: Laura Palmer's harrowing final days are chronicled one year after the murder of Teresa Banks.

movies.title: Taxi Driver
movies.description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City.

movies.title: Brick
movies.description: A teenage loner pushes his way into the underworld of a high school crime ring to investigate the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend.

movies.title: 12 Angry Men
movies.description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence.

movies.title: Good Will Hunting
movies.description: A therapist counsels Will Hunting, a janitor with a genius IQ.

movies.title: Wesele
movies.description: A brutal and honest diagnosis of Polish society in one night.

movies.title: Kill Bill
movies.description: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

movies.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
movies.description: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter, where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.
